title: Gnar Puns â€” Show me what you got
body: Like the title says, give me your best Gnar puns!

replies.body: Definitely Gnart Blitzcrank
I've got to hand it to him. This pun can't be ignared.
Play as support, rush Gnargon's Brace.
I'd think Gnardian Angel would be more appropriate for him.
Why Gnart both?
You guys are so ig-Gnar-ant of what makes a good pun...
Enlighten us, oh master gnarrator.
You will Gnar-ver be ready to understand
Try me, Govegnar.

I gnar-ticed you were looking to learn more about puns.

Like Tiamat on Morgana and Hurricane on Garen, that's two bad.
Now now, let's not get s-Gnar-ky
A wild Phreak appears. Definitely some paragnarmol activity going on around here....
Are you sure you Gnar-en't stretching the sounds a little bit there?
But it's great because this thread is getting engnarmous
It's gonna be pretty hard for people to ignar this thread.
This thread reminds me of the Chronicles of Gnarnia.
Looks like you and Brydaro will have to fight to the death over that specific pun. :P
Gnar. I won't allow it.
Don't be such a Gnarcissist.
http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/clintnod.gif
{{champion:238}} From the shadows, I pun!
2v1? Das cold Rito. I need a Skgnarf
Oh yeah? You and what Gnarmy?
http://i784.photobucket.com/albums/yy121/OJMcG/Oohcat.gif
Gnars fired
He's just being so... Gnarrow minded.

That's it. I'm done....

*FLIPDESK*

See you all tognarrow....
Gnarf!
Gnarmally we would leave you alone
These puns are killing me. I need some gnarcotics after this.
Gnarnsense, I think he's got the right idea
Gnarn of you have gnarticed the fact that, in your ignarance, you have failed to get multiple puns ingnarow (in a row)
http://i.imgur.com/5RbjYyx.jpg

Gnar's no yordle, he's a prehistordle!
If you barely get away from him, you make a Gnarrow escape!
If you use him in All For One, you form a Gnarmy!
If he keeps falling asleep, he's Gnarcoleptic!
If he builds AD, you've got to build Gnarmor!
If he builds AP, his power is Gnarcane!
Prepare for RA-GNAR-OK.
{{champion:2}} approves.

http://www.j1studios.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/commission__traein_17_by_mtc_studios-d6l65ge.png

I choose you Gnarlax!
The Chronicles of Gnarnia: The Leona, the Lissandra, and the sight ward.

He's a Gnar if he facechecks that bush.

That champ should take up piracy as he's a real Gnar-do-well.

Phreak and other pun-lovers find this thread is quite Gnarly.  

As they say, here today, gnar tomorrow.

That champ is a beast who Gnarly got me.



>Knock-knock.
>Who's there?
>Gnar.
>Gnar who?
>You're Gnar-t going to like the answer to that.

Knock-knock joke, check.

>What do you call a Gnar in glasses?
>Give up yet?
>A Gnar-d

Bad joke, check.

>I heard that MW is introducing a new beast of a light mech; they're calling it the Gnar mk VII.

Joke/pun referencing another franchise, check.

>I heard there was a real problem in getting this champ finished for Riot.
>Yeah, his original gameplay and theme was too Gnaric for their liking.

Gameplay pun, check.

>Do you know what the new tierlists everyone is going to do when Gnar comes out will be called?
>Oh please no...
>Yeap, the Gnar-ation X tierlists.


So, all I can say now is that we need Riot Penguin to make a Gwar Gnar skin.  That's not a pun but a play on words.  I give him a 50% chance of at least trying to pitch the idea.
You don't really want this to happen. Gnar do I.

http://www.spwned.net/pics/godzilla4.gif

Ignarant fools! **I WILL REIGN SUPREME.**
Where's the guy who suggested Gnaruto?

Rito orignally made him a Gnarwhal, but decided against it.

When he was in school, Gnomenclature was the hardest subject. Lunch was the easiest though, Gnoming on a fresh yordle sandwich.

He Gnever gives up,

and my puns suck
Egnarf's enough, I arbitrarily claim victory. It was a gnard-fought battle though.
You bring dishongnar to this thread!

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/0/9464/208092-106562-snarf.jpg

Gnarf?

Winter! Winter! Winter! Avarosians, ho!
He's come from Gnarnia
gnarwhalls?

Puns from near and Gnar will gather here today.

Prepare yourselves, there will be puns, there will be memes, there will be.....   

total a-gnar-ilation
